results.definition: a disposition to be kind and forgiving
leniency and compassion shown toward offenders by a person or agency charged with administering justice
examples: he threw himself on the mercy of the court

results.definition: alleviation of distress; showing great kindness toward the distressed
examples: distributing food and clothing to the flood victims was an act of mercy

results.definition: something for which to be thankful
examples: it was a mercy we got out alive
